co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

Interface ThumbnailManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThumbnailManagerDefault

    public interface ThumbnailManager
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15. Type used as utility to support the management of image galleries. Includes utilities to create thumbnails according to provide criteria and refresh the thumbnails if the underlying image changes, for example.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder, java.util.List<GalleryImage> imageList)
      Takes a list of gallery images and uses this to create a thumbnail for every image, in the location defined by the gallery name.
      boolean createThumbnail(java.io.File galleryRootFolder, GalleryImage image)
      Takes details of a gallery image and its folder, then creates a resized version of the corresponding image and places it in the thumbnail folder for the given gallery.
      void createThumbnailFolder(java.io.File galleryRootFolder)
      Create a directory to place thumbnail images for a gallery
      void deleteAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder)
      Takes the root folder for a gallery, works out where the thumbnails are and deletes them all.
      void deleteAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder, java.util.List<GalleryImage> imageList)
      Takes the root folder for a gallery, and a list of images within the gallery, and deletes all the thumbnails for the images.
      void deleteThumbnail(java.io.File galleryRootFolder, GalleryImage image)
      Takes details of a gallery image and its folder, then deletes the thumbnail corresponding to that image if it is present.
      void deleteThumbnailFolder(java.io.File galleryRootFolder) 

    • Method Detail

      • createThumbnailFolder

        void createThumbnailFolder(java.io.File galleryRootFolder)
        Create a directory to place thumbnail images for a gallery
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to create a thumbnail folder.

      • deleteThumbnailFolder

        void deleteThumbnailFolder(java.io.File galleryRootFolder)
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to delete a thumbnail folder.

      • createThumbnail

        boolean createThumbnail(java.io.File galleryRootFolder,
                      GalleryImage image)
        Takes details of a gallery image and its folder, then creates a resized version of the corresponding image and places it in the thumbnail folder for the given gallery.
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to create a thumbnail.
        image - Object containing details of the image (including its file location) used to locate file and create thumbnail.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if error.

      • deleteThumbnail

        void deleteThumbnail(java.io.File galleryRootFolder,
                   GalleryImage image)
        Takes details of a gallery image and its folder, then deletes the thumbnail corresponding to that image if it is present.
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to delete a thumbnail.
        image - Object containting details of the image (including its file location) used to locate file and delete thumbnail.

      • createAllThumbnails

        boolean createAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder,
                          java.util.List<GalleryImage> imageList)
        Takes a list of gallery images and uses this to create a thumbnail for every image, in the location defined by the gallery name.
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to create the thumbnails.
        imageList -
        Returns:
        Returns false if there is an error creating creating the thumbnails or other error which stops thumbnails being generated.

      • deleteAllThumbnails

        void deleteAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder)
        Takes the root folder for a gallery, works out where the thumbnails are and deletes them all. Note this method doesn't use a list of images to work from, it just deletes all images in the folder.
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder - The full path of the gallery folder under which to create the thumbnails.

      • deleteAllThumbnails

        void deleteAllThumbnails(java.io.File galleryRootFolder,
                       java.util.List<GalleryImage> imageList)
        Takes the root folder for a gallery, and a list of images within the gallery, and deletes all the thumbnails for the images.
        Parameters:
        galleryRootFolder -
        imageList -
